channel.title: How do you make NPC's aggresive and kill anything they see?
channel.description: I want to make a black demon guard something and nail who ever it sees, How would I code it? Someone please help. Much appreciated! ;D

npcs[i].RandomWalk = true; npcs[i].IsUnderAttack = true; if (npcs[i].StartKilling > 0) {

and

npcs[i].IsUnderAttackNpc = true; npcs[npcs[i].attacknpc].IsUnderAttackNpc = true; if (npcs[i].attacknpc > 0) {
